privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, process and protect your personal information in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect the information that you provide us directly when you register for our services, fill out a form or communicate with us. This information may include your name, email address, phone number and any other information that you choose to provide us.

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.content: We use your personal data for:

purposes.services: Provide, maintain and improve our services
purposes.transactions: Process transactions and send related notifications
purposes.responses: Respond to your comments, questions and requests

cookies.title: Use of Cookies
cookies.introduction: Our site uses cookies to improve your browsing experience. Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help us analyze how users use our site.

types.title: Types of cookies used
types.essential: Essential cookies: Necessary for the functioning of the site
types.analytics: Analytics cookies: To analyze how visitors use our site
types.functional: Functional cookies: To remember your preferences
types.advertising: Advertising cookies: To deliver relevant advertisements

control.title: Cookie Control
control.content: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies already on your device and configure most browsers to prevent them from being placed.

userRights.title: User Rights
userRights.introduction: In accordance with the GDPR, you have the following rights regarding your data:

rights.access: Right of access: You can request a copy of your personal data
rights.rectification: Right to rectification: You can request correction of your inaccurate data
rights.erasure: Right to erasure: You can request deletion of your data
rights.restriction: Right to restriction of processing: You can request to limit the processing
rights.portability: Right to data portability: You can request the transfer of your data
rights.objection: Right to object: You can object to the processing of your data

other.title: Other
other.content: This section contains additional information about our privacy practices and policies.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have any questions about our privacy policy or practices, please contact us through our website or by email at privacy@hargile.com.

international.title: International Transfers
international.content: Your information may be transferred to — and maintained on — computers located outside of your state, province, country or other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ from those in your jurisdiction.

contactSupport.title: Contact Support
contactSupport.content: For any questions or concerns regarding this privacy policy, please contact our data protection officer at dpo@hargile.com.
